text: Junrei (no jiki) wa shuchi no su tsukidearu. Sorede sonoaida ni junrei no tsutome o hatasou to kesshin shita mono wa, junrei-chu, waisetsuna okonai ya fudotokuna okonai o Maki shimi, mata ronso shite wa naranai. Anata gata no okonau yoi koto o, arra wa shitte ora reru. Tabi no junbi o shi nasai.Daga mottomo sugureta junbi wa tokushin no nendearu. Anata gata shiryo aru mono yo, ware o osore nasai
